@@infor
4096x3072_30.0fps_PDVC_992x760_HighGain_Mirror_Flip_Normal
 MCLK: 24Mhz
 resolution: 4096x3072_30.0fps
 PD size:
 Mipi : 4lane
 Mipi data rate:1902Mbps/Lane
 SCLK   :100Mhz
 FPS	    :30
 HTS		:0x1a9 (R380c:R380d)
 VTS		:0x1ea0 (R380e:R380f)
 tLine: 4.25us (=HTS/SCLK)
 1 unit of r3500~3502: 1*tLine
 exp. step : 2
 max. analog gain: 62X (r3508:r3509)
 VB		:
 mirror/flip   : normal
